trans-unit.source: Represents an attribute used for CMS/PKCS #7 and PKCS #9 operations.

A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9AttributeObject> object can be thought of as a strongly typed <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object because of the addition of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9AttributeObject.Oid%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9AttributeObject"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9AttributeObject"></xref> class using a specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object as its attribute type and value.
An object that contains the PKCS #9 attribute type and value to use.
The length of the Value member of the Oid member of asnEncodedData is zero.
The Oid member of asnEncodedData is `null`.
-or-
The Value member of the Oid member of asnEncodedData is `null`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9AttributeObject"></xref> class using a specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object as the attribute type and a specified ASN.1 encoded data as the attribute value.
An object that represents the PKCS #9 attribute type.
An array of byte values that represents the PKCS #9 attribute value.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9AttributeObject"></xref> class using a specified string representation of an object identifier (OID) as the attribute type and a specified ASN.1 encoded data as the attribute value.
The string representation of an OID that represents the PKCS #9 attribute type.
An array of byte values that contains the PKCS #9 attribute value.

Copies a PKCS #9 attribute type and value for this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9AttributeObject"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object.
An object that contains the PKCS #9 attribute type and value to use.
asnEncodeData does not represent a compatible attribute type.
asnEncodedData is `null`.

Gets an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object that represents the type of attribute associated with this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9AttributeObject"></xref> object.
An object that represents the type of attribute associated with this <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9AttributeObject"></xref> object.
